    7: %%% Created : 14. Jul 2015 4:49 PM
    8: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
    9: -module(basic_SUITE).
   10: -author("ludwikbukowski").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   13: 
   14: 
   15: -define(FILE_C,code:priv_dir(iot)++"/driver").
   16: -define(FILE_MOCK,code:priv_dir(iot)++"/driver_mock").
   17: -define(DRIVER_S,driver_server).
   18: -define(MANAGER_S, driver_manager).
   19: %% API
   20: -export([all/0, simple_test/1, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, driver_receive_test/1, close_port_test/1, var_receive_test/1,
   21:   pass_data_test/1, check_port_test/1, error_receive_test1/1, driver_send_test1/1, driver_send_test2/1, whole_echo_test/1]).
   22: 
   23: groups()->[{communication,[sequence],[check_port_test,driver_receive_test,var_receive_test,pass_data_test,
   24:   driver_send_test1,driver_send_test2,whole_echo_test,close_port_test]}].
   25: 
   26: all()->[simple_test,{group,communication}].
   27: 
   28: 
   29: %% Init
   30: init_per_suite(Config)->
   31:   ok = application:start(meck),
   32:   ok = application:start(iot),
   33:   Config.
   34: 
   35: end_per_suite(_)->
   36:   ok = application:stop(iot),
   37:   ok = application:stop(meck).
   38: 
   39: 
   40: init_per_group(communication,Config)->
   41:   meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   42:   meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,openport,fun()->gen_server:call(driver_manager,{openport,?FILE_MOCK}) end),
   43:   ?MANAGER_S:openport(),
   44:   meck:unload(?MANAGER_S),
   45:   Config.
   46: 
   47: end_per_group(communication,_)->
   48:   ?DRIVER_S:closeport(),
   49:   ok.
   50: 
   51: 
   52: 
   53: %% Tests
   54: simple_test(_)->
   55:   true = is_pid(whereis(zeus_supervisor)),
   56:   true = is_pid(whereis(?MANAGER_S)).
   57: 
   58: %% Driver_server side
   59: check_port_test(_)->
   60:   ok.
   61: 
   62: driver_receive_test(_) ->                                                   %% Receive data from fake driver
   63:   meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   64:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   65:   meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,adddata,fun(Msg)->{ok,Msg} end),                       %% Mock Var_server response
   66:   ?DRIVER_S ! {some_port,{data,<<"Hej!">>}},
   67:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
   68:   meck:unload(?DRIVER_S),
   69:   meck:unload(?MANAGER_S).
   70: 
   71: %% Var Server side
   72: var_receive_test(_)->                                                       %% Receiving data from var server
   73:   ?MANAGER_S:adddata({some_port,{data,<<"Hi there!">>}}),
   74:   [{some_port,{data,<<"Hi there!">>}}] = ?MANAGER_S:getdata().
   75: 
   76: %% Mixed
   77: pass_data_test(_)->                                                         %% Passing data between driver and var server
   78:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   79:   ?DRIVER_S ! {some_port,{data,<<"Hello my friend!">>}},
   80:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
   81:   [{some_port,{data,<<"Hi there!">>}},
   82:     {some_port,{data,<<"Hello my friend!">>}}] = ?MANAGER_S:getdata(),          %% There should be twu messages in Var server
   83:   meck:unload(?DRIVER_S).
   84: 
   85: 
   86: driver_send_test1(_)->                                                      %% Sending data to mocked driver (without handling answer)
   87:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   88:   meck:expect(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,fun(_,Arg2)->{noreply,Arg2} end),
   89:   ok = ?DRIVER_S:senddata("Some funny stuff."),
   90:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
   91:   meck:unload(?DRIVER_S).
   92: 
   93: driver_send_test2(_)->                                                       %% Sending data to movked driver (without passing to var server)
   94:   meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   95:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
   96:   meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,adddata,fun(Msg)->{ok,Msg} end),
   97:   ?DRIVER_S:senddata("Some well-known movie quote."),
   98:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
   99:   meck:unload(?DRIVER_S),
  100:   meck:unload(?MANAGER_S).
  101: 
  102: whole_echo_test(_)->                                                         %% Send data to driver, get answer and pass to var server
  103:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
  104:   ?DRIVER_S:senddata("Rolling Stones roxs"),
  105:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
  106:   [_,_,{_,{data,<<"Rolling Stones roxs">>}}] = driver_manager:getdata(),
  107:   meck:unload(?DRIVER_S).
  108: 
  109: 
  110: close_port_test(_)->
  111:   [] = ?DRIVER_S:closeport().
  112: 
  113: 
  114: error_receive_test1(_) ->                                                %% TODO Test crashes
  115:   meck:new(?MANAGER_S,[unstick,passthrough]),
  116:   meck:new(?DRIVER_S ,[unstick,passthrough]),
  117:   meck:expect(?MANAGER_S,adddata,fun(Msg)->{ok,Msg} end),
  118:   ?DRIVER_S ! {'EXIT',some_port, normal},
  119:   meck:wait(?DRIVER_S,handle_info,['_','_'],5000),
  120:   meck:unload(?MANAGER_S).
  121: 
  122: 
  123: 
  124:
